alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:34PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lander County through 315 PM PDT... At 232 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 28 miles west of Grass Valley, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, heavy rainfall, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Lander County, though it will move over State Route 306 about 43 miles south of Battle Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
